content:
I have a set of warnings that I'd like to ignore via a pattern. They all deal with display names and the display names we need in our example differ from what the official LOINC package is asserting. My problem is that every time we add a translation, I get the warnings back because the exact text changes. I tried reading the documentation to see how to specify a pattern and I don't see how.

Also, @Grahame Grieve I'm getting two different warning messages for the same warning:

The display "DESCRIPTION SECTION" is not a valid display for the code {http://loinc.org}34089-3 - should be one of ['FDA package insert Description section', 'FDA insert Description section', 'SPL' (zh-CN), '结构化产品标签' (zh-CN), 'Structured Product Labelling' (zh-CN), '结构化产品标记' (zh-CN), '结构化产品标识' (zh-CN), '美国食品及药品管理局包装说明书' (zh-CN), '超系统 - FDA 包装说明书' (zh-CN), '食品及药品管理局包装说明书' (zh-CN), 'FDA 包装插页 参考文件' (zh-CN), '参考文档' (zh-CN), '引用文件' (zh-CN), '引用文档' (zh-CN), '文件.参考' (zh-CN), '文件.引用' (zh-CN), '文档.引用 叙述' (zh-CN), '叙述性文字' (zh-CN), '报告' (zh-CN), '报告型' (zh-CN), '文字叙述' (zh-CN), '文本叙述型' (zh-CN), '文本描述' (zh-CN), '文本描述型 描述章节' (zh-CN), '说明小节' (zh-CN), '' (zh-CN), 'Documentazione di riferimento Foglio illustrativo della Food and Drug Administra Sezione di descrizione' (it-IT), 'Описательный' (ru-RU)] (from http://tx.fhir.org/r4) for 'http://loinc.org#34089-3'

and

The display "DESCRIPTION SECTION" is not a valid display for the code {http://loinc.org}34089-3 - should be one of ['FDA package insert Description section', 'FDA insert Description section', 'SPL' (zh-CN), '结构化产品标签' (zh-CN), 'Structured Product Labelling' (zh-CN), '结构化产品标记' (zh-CN), '结构化产品标识' (zh-CN), '美国食品及药品管理局包装说明书' (zh-CN), '超系统 - FDA 包装说明书' (zh-CN), '食品及药品管理局包装说明书' (zh-CN), 'FDA 包装插页 参考文件' (zh-CN), '参考文档' (zh-CN), '引用文件' (zh-CN), '引用文档' (zh-CN), '文件.参考' (zh-CN), '文件.引用' (zh-CN), '文档.引用 叙述' (zh-CN), '叙述性文字' (zh-CN), '报告' (zh-CN), '报告型' (zh-CN), '文字叙述' (zh-CN), '文本叙述型' (zh-CN), '文本描述' (zh-CN), '文本描述型 描述章节' (zh-CN), '说明小节' (zh-CN), '' (zh-CN), 'Documentazione di riferimento Foglio illustrativo della Food and Drug Administra Sezione di descrizione' (it-IT), 'Описательный' (ru-RU)] (from http://tx.fhir.org/r4)

One has "for 'http://loinc.org#34089-3'" on the end of the message while the other one does not.

Okay, found actual documentation and you do patterns by putting '%' at the start and/or end. (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Implementation+Guide+Parameters)

But the difference in the warning messages might still be important.
Jean Duteau has marked this topic as resolved.

Note that you need to be cautious about using wildcards. In general, you ought to check each of your display names and confirm they're correct. Even if most of the issues are caused by tooling, there's still a chance that one or two of them are wrong.
